meanings.definition: More attractive or impressive in a masculine way.
meanings.sent1: The new sports car looked studlier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: He felt studlier when he wore his favorite suit.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape made him look even studlier than usual.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood studlier against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The actor's confident smile made him appear even studlier on screen.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is more attractive or impressive in a masculine way.
meanings.sent1: He walked studlier than usual, with a confident stride.
meanings.sent2: She sang studlier than anyone else at the karaoke night.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted studlier than the dog, showing off its agility.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone studlier through the clouds after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The athlete ran studlier than ever before, breaking his own record.
